text: Kɨ fo, ian donkiba 3plan dughiar gɨvazibar ovenge, ezɨ nɨ da bagh osɨman markɨ. Me da batogha gɨfa. Ezɨ nɨ oragh. Israelian gumazamiziba, me bar tinara gifonge? Me nɨ ko nɨn afeziamɨn adarazira bar me gifonge. Bar guizbangɨra!”9:20 Hibrun akam kagh deragha akam abɨghizir puvatɨ. Gumazir maba kamaghɨn a gɨra, “Nɨ manmaghɨn nɨghnɨsi, tinara Israelian bizir aghuiba iniam? Nɨ uan afeziamɨn adarazi ko, iarara ada iniam.”
